title: Food Bank Sunday
description: Please bring non-perishable food items to donate to the local food bank. Items can be placed in the donation box in the foyer.

title: Ladies Bible Study - Genesis
description: The Wednesday morning Bible study will begin a new study in Genesis. The study includes a DVD by Jen Wilkins and a study guide.

title: Open Studio
description: A time for artists, crafters, artist wannabe's and observers to gather together every 3rd Tuesday. Bring your current project, materials, tools and join in a time of creating and community! A light lunch will be provided for January.

title: Communion
description: Communion will be served this Sunday, January 12th.

title: Deacon's Meeting
description: Deacon's meeting will be on the 3rd Wednesday this month, January 15th, at 7:00PM.

title: LRBC Annual Meeting
description: The LRBC Annual Meeting will be held on Sunday, January 26th, following the morning service.
